title: Fantasy/Exploration/RPG - Music Pack
description: This Pack is designed for Enchanted Forests, Exploration, Fantasy, Fantastic Worlds and RPG games.
longDescription:
This Pack is designed for Enchanted Forests, Exploration, Fantasy, Fantastic Worlds and RPG games.


Listen here


This pack contains 101 files: full tracks, loops, variations, layers and ambients; appropriate for forests, caves, exploration, deep emotions, characters and battles.


All you need for interactive game music. 


- Inside the pack - 101 Files // 1:52:52 -
